decks.name: Flashcards
decks.description: Learn how to use this app

cards.question: Whats happening when **all cards are shown** in a **quiz**?
cards.answer: The quiz will stop and show me how i done.

cards.question: Whats happening when **all cards are shown** in a **training session**?
cards.answer: It will show me cards i have done **good** with **less** and cards i have **problems** with **more often**.

cards.question: What is the *most important thing about learning*?
How can i `add cards` to a deck?
cards.answer:
Just click `"EDIT"`,
then scroll to bottom
and click `"+ ADD NEW CARD"` lalala
